channel.title: meta on Sivert Does Stuff Online!
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Sivert Does Stuff Online!

item.title: IT Apprentice
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: This section of my blog serves as an index of technologies I’ve learned or became better at as an apprentice working in IT. 😀 It also serves the purpose of the required documentation Apprentices in Norway are supposed to do. 😳 Here are lists of stuff I’ll be writing about here; Programming Python Flask 🍼 SQLAlchemy 🍶 MSAL (Microsoft Authentication Library) 🪕 Browser JavaScript jQuery 📲 Handlebars.js 〰️ Programs / Tools FreeRADIUS 🔮 Postgres 💾 Ansible 🔫 OS / Networking Debian 🎎 Mikrotik 📦 Cisco Meraki ☁️ Azure App Registration 🚀 Active Directory 💫 The WHM saga (shortie) Wordpress 👀 cPanel 💩 WHM 👌

item.title: About
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: This webpage is my portfolio webpage and blog. 🌀 It’s build with hugo and hosted on github.io with GitHub Pages! 😎

item.title: Siverts Tech Adventure Blog
item.author: gmail@sivert.pw (Sivert V. Sæther)
item.description: Here you are welcome to take a look at all my blog posts! 🌀 And be sure to add the RSS feed to your news reader! 😉
